mapper.sql: id, shop_no, coupon_no, name, coupon_sum, obtain_num, use_num, status, created_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select ti.id as coupon_id, ti.coupon_no, ti.coupon_sum, ti.name, ti.status as couponStatus, ti.obtain_num, ti.coupon_sum-ti.obtain_num as surplus_num, ti.use_num, ti.create_time as ticketCreatedAt,
info.id, info.coupon_detail_no, info.remark, info.shop_type, info.validity_type, info.begin_time, info.end_time, info.days as days, info.use_type, info.full_money, info.discount_money, info.take_num, info.superposition, info.obtain FROM coupon ti LEFT JOIN coupon_detail info ON ti.id = info.coupon_id and info.status=1 /**取最新一条*/ where ti.shop_no=#{shopNo} and ti.id=#{id}
